statements: SELECT * FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE eco_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM eco_conscious_customers ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, eco_score FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE eco_score < 30;
SELECT MAX(eco_score) AS highest_eco_score FROM eco_conscious_customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE eco_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, eco_score FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE eco_score BETWEEN 50 AND 75;
SELECT * FROM eco_conscious_customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, eco_score FROM eco_conscious_customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city FROM customers WHERE eco_conscious = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount >= 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city FROM customers WHERE eco_conscious = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city LIKE 'New%' AND age < 40 ORDER BY city ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_conscious_consumers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM eco_conscious_consumers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, eco_level FROM eco_conscious_consumers WHERE eco_level > 3;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, eco_level FROM eco_conscious_consumers
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Clothing'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, favorite_brand FROM eco_conscious_consumers JOIN customer_preferences ON eco_conscious_consumers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, total_price FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT age_group, income_range FROM demographics WHERE eco_friendly_rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM behaviors WHERE social_media_engagement = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_customers DESC
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.quantity, p.total_price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_price > 100
SELECT d.age_group, d.income_range, b.feedback FROM demographics d LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON d.age_group = b.purchase_pattern
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id < 5;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM products p JOIN customers c ON p.product_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, p.customer_id, payment_method, total_amount, first_name, last_name FROM purchases p INNER JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
